title: miCare A Primary Care Health Center is currently hiring (pic)
text:
miCare A Primary Care Health Center is currently hiring ad date: 10/17/2015 
miCare A Primary Care Health Center is currently hiring for... Nurse Practitioner Physician Assistant Registered Nurse (RN) Enjoy a unique work/life balance opportunity with a part-time flexible schedule, inclusive of pre-determined work hours during the week. No nights! No weekends! No on-call shifts! This employer-sponsored health clinic offers a pleasant work environment. Partner with member(s), regarding proactive disease management, wellness and prevention. miCare provides a competitive compensation and generous benefits package. Come join our local miCare team! For more details, contact Jodi Byrne, PHR @ 406-869-6545 or send resume to jbyrne@ebms.com Position description available at http://micare.applicantpro.com/jobs/ EBMS is an EEO/AA/M/F/Vet/
